articles.author: Shawn Pogatchnik
articles.title: Ireland's top court rejects Canada-EU trade deal as unconstitutional - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Supreme Court judges say Ireland’s parliament can approve the CETA deal only if it first amends national arbitration law, a victory for rebel Green lawmakers.
articles.content:
DUBLIN Irelands parliamentary efforts to ratify the EU-Canada trade deal are unconstitutional, the Irish Supreme Court ruled Friday in the first such legal rejection by an EU member state.
The judgm… [+2008 chars]

articles.title: Climate Change: Western countries are hypocrites, can't dictate to Africa - Buhari - Premium Times
articles.description: "Don’t tell Africa that the world cannot afford the climate cost of its hydrocarbons and then fire up coal stations whenever Europe feels an energy pinch," Mr Buhari wrote.
articles.content:

articles.title: German harmonised inflation +11.6% y/y in October - Reuters
articles.description: Germany's consumer prices, harmonised to compare with other European countries, were 11.6% higher year-on-year in October, the Federal Statistical Office said on Friday, confirming preliminary figures.
